title: Kitchen knife

properties.name: description
properties.value: The kitchen knife is a melee kitchen weapon that can be bought from the Culinaromancer's chest. To wield this, the player must have completed any 8 Recipe for Disaster subquests. This weapon has stats equivalent to the Rune dagger, though the kitchen knife cannot be poisoned. It cannot be used in place of an ordinary knife for cooking or fletching purposes. It has a requirement of level 40 Attack to wield.

Item ID7447

The kitchen knife is a melee kitchen weapon that can be bought from the Culinaromancer's chest. To wield this, the player must have completed any 8 Recipe for Disaster subquests. This weapon has stats equivalent to the Rune dagger, though the kitchen knife cannot be poisoned. It cannot be used in place of an ordinary knife for cooking or fletching purposes. It has a requirement of level 40 Attack to wield.

[[File:Kitchen knife detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''kitchen knife''' is a [[melee]] [[kitchen weapon]] that can be bought from the [[Culinaromancer's chest]]. To wield this, the player must have completed any 8 [[Recipe for Disaster]] subquests. This weapon has stats equivalent to the [[Rune dagger]], though the kitchen knife ''cannot'' be [[poison]]ed. It cannot be used in place of an ordinary [[knife]] for [[cooking]] or [[fletching]] purposes. It has a requirement of level 40 [[Attack]] to wield.
